```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning= FALSE, results = 'hide'}
library(kableExtra)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
#read in table 8 
Table8 <- read.csv(params$Table8)
```



```{r}
#display table 8 
Table8 %>%
  kable("html", 
        caption = "Top 25% of expression", 
        booktabs = TRUE, 
        escape = FALSE) %>%  # Escape = FALSE to render HTML
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), 
                full_width = FALSE, 
                position = "center") %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = "4cm", bold = TRUE, color = "white", background = "#4CAF50") %>% 
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, font_size = 14, color = "white", background = "#4CAF50") %>% 
  footnote(general = "Table shows the top 10 rows of KBT sorted by bit score, with hyperlinks to UniProt entries.", 
           general_title = "Note: ", 
           footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)
```
